meanings.definition: To make something larger or more extensive than usual.
meanings.sent1: She always supersizes her popcorn at the movies.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to supersizes their product line to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally supersizes the cake, making it too big for the oven!
meanings.sent4: His imagination supersizes every story he tells, making them more exciting.
meanings.sent5: The magic potion supersizes everything it touches, creating chaos in the town.

meanings.sent4: Her purse was like a supersizes bag, fitting everything she needed.
